summary: This is an email from a Supervisory Correctional Systems Specialist at MCC New York, dated August 6, 2021, sending paperwork including a marshal's receipt and court list example, and mentioning they are looking for an R&D assignment roster. The document appears to be routine administrative correspondence related to prison operations.

persons.name: Supervisory Correctional Systems Specialist
persons.role: Supervisory Correctional Systems Specialist at MCC New York
persons.context: The sender of the email, working at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, who is sending paperwork and looking for an R&D assignment roster.

locations.name: MCC New York
locations.context: Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, the facility from which the email is sent.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 6, 2021, from a Supervisory Correctional Systems Specialist at MCC New York.
The email transmits a marshal's receipt and an example of a court list as requested paperwork.
The sender indicates they are still looking for an R&D assignment roster and plan to ask another R&D supervisor.
The document is marked as potentially containing sensitive information for official use only.
The correspondence appears to be routine administrative communication related to correctional facility operations.
